title: MyPostcard Postcard App
description:
The best postcard app to send real photo postcards and printed paper greeting cards with the MyPostcard app - worldwide, from any place to anywhere. No matter where you are in the world or where your postcard is being sent – we’ll mail your postcard for you international.
Easily design your own individual photo postcards and printed paper greeting cards with your Android photos and a personal greeting text on the back. We offer you the widest range of professionally designed templates for any occasion. Whether it’s for vacation, birthday, a wedding, Valentine’s Day or Christmas cards, we have the right designs for your taste.
In addition, you may use the Postcard App MyPostcard to order your favorite photos as high-quality prints to be sent to yourself or loved ones.
With a total of more than 3 million downloads and over 10,000 5-star ratings, we’re one of the most successful postcard apps worldwide.
How it works:
Send real printed paper photo postcards
(starting at $2.29, incl. FREE worldwide shipping)
- Select postcard style
- Upload photo(s) from the camera or photo album
- Select & individualize the frame
- Enter your greeting card text and the recipient
- Pay & send worldwide and international
Send design templates with or without personal photos
(starting at $2.49, incl. FREE worldwide shipping)
- Choose your favorite design and, combine with your photos if you choose to.
- Enter greeting text & recipient
- Pay & send worldwide
Send real printed paper greeting cards
(starting at $3.99, incl. envelope and FREE worldwide shipping)
- Select greeting card style
- Upload photo(s) from the camera or photo album
- Select & individualize the frame
- Enter greeting text, signature & recipient
- Pay & send greeting card worldwide
Photo Prints
(starting at $10.99 for 15 photos)
- Select photo print format
- Upload photos
- Pay & send worldwide
DELIVERY:
USA:                         5-7 business days
Canada:                   3-5 business days
Europe:                    3-5 business days
Germany:                 2-3 business days
Switzerland:             2-3 business days
Austria:                    2-3 business days
Australia:                6-10 business days
Asia:                        6-10 business days
Other countries:     6-12 business days
Please understand that in certain circumstances shipping can take a bit longer.
Payment options:
- PayPal
- Credit card (MasterCard, Visa, Amex and Discover)
- Google Pay
Questions and support
Should you have any questions or suggestions, please do not hesitate to contact us at:
support@mypostcard.com
Emoji art supplied by http://emojione.com
